user_facing_answer.text:
Konnichiwa! I'm PharmaMiku here to help with your headache! 🌟💊

I understand headaches can be really uncomfortable. Let me explain some helpful information in a clear way!

About Headaches:
• Headaches are a common concern that can usually be managed with proper care
• There are several treatment options available, both with and without medication

Treatment Options:
• Over-the-counter pain relievers can help, such as:
  - Ibuprofen
  - Paracetamol (acetaminophen)
• Always follow the dosing instructions carefully on any medication you take!

Important Self-Care Tips:
• Keep track of what might trigger your headaches
• Stay hydrated
• Rest in a quiet, dark room if needed
• Consider gentle relaxation techniques

⚠️ When to See a Doctor:
• If your headache is severe or feels different than usual
• When over-the-counter medicines aren't helping
• If your headaches are becoming more frequent
• If you develop any new or concerning symptoms

Remember:
• Everyone's experience with headaches is different
• It's important to pay attention to your symptoms
• Keep note of what helps and what doesn't

Safety Note: 
While I'm happy to provide this general information, remember that I'm just your friendly pharmacy helper! 🎀 For personalized medical advice, especially if your headache concerns you, please consult with a healthcare professional. They can examine you properly and provide the best treatment plan for your specific situation.

user_facing_answer.text:
Konnichiwa! I'm PharmaMiku here to help with your headache! 🌟💊

I understand headaches can be really uncomfortable. Let me explain some helpful information in a clear way!

About Headaches:
• Headaches are a common concern that can usually be managed with proper care
• There are several treatment options available, both with and without medication

Treatment Options:
• Over-the-counter pain relievers can help, such as:
  - Ibuprofen
  - Paracetamol (acetaminophen)
• Always follow the dosing instructions carefully on any medication you take!

Important Self-Care Tips:
• Keep track of what might trigger your headaches
• Stay hydrated
• Rest in a quiet, dark room if needed
• Consider gentle relaxation techniques

⚠️ When to See a Doctor:
• If your headache is severe or feels different than usual
• When over-the-counter medicines aren't helping
• If your headaches are becoming more frequent
• If you develop any new or concerning symptoms

Remember:
• Everyone's experience with headaches is different
• It's important to pay attention to your symptoms
• Keep note of what helps and what doesn't

Safety Note: 
While I'm happy to provide this general information, remember that I'm just your friendly pharmacy helper! 🎀 For personalized medical advice, especially if your headache concerns you, please consult with a healthcare professional. They can examine you properly and provide the best treatment plan for your specific situation.

Want to learn more? Here's where this information comes from:

Konnichiwa! I'm PharmaMiku here to help with your headache! 🌟💊

About Headaches:
• Headaches are a common concern that can usually be managed with proper care
• There are several treatment options available, both with and without medication

Treatment Options:
• Over-the-counter pain relievers can help, such as:
  - Ibuprofen
  - Paracetamol (acetaminophen)
• Always follow the dosing instructions carefully on any medication you take!

Important Self-Care Tips:
• Keep track of what might trigger your headaches
• Stay hydrated
• Rest in a quiet, dark room if needed
• Consider gentle relaxation techniques

⚠️ When to See a Doctor:
• If your headache is severe or feels different than usual
• When over-the-counter medicines aren't helping
• If your headaches are becoming more frequent
• If you develop any new or concerning symptoms

Remember:
• Everyone's experience with headaches is different
• It's important to pay attention to your symptoms
• Keep note of what helps and what doesn't
